document.title: Hot Topic: Government Pension Offset and Windfall Elimination Provisions of the Social Security Administration
document.abstract: The GPO and WEP are two provisions of the act that reduce the Social Security benefits of non-covered workers who become entitled to Social Security either through a spouse or by working the requisite amount of time in a covered position.
